text: @BBCNews I will be amazed if this works and I truly mean that because If we can find a vaccine for Covid19 in matter of a few months why haven’t we found one for the common cold or HIV, is it because there’s money to be made in cold remedies and HIV is seen as lifestyle choice 🤔
